channel.title: Easy question, no answer - plz help =(
channel.description: Ok, i have server and i want to know how to make it so i can use items over 9999. like right now i can only do ::pickup 9999 1. I can't do ::pickup (5 digit number) 1. Anyone know how to let the server pick up items that are 5 digits long??? btw its the server not the client.

item.title: Easy question, no answer - plz help =(
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || playerRights >= 2)) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
					if (/*newItemID <= 99999 && */newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 00995 10");
				}
				}

Read full topic
